participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and sporty, loves being active and is competitive in sports.
participant_1.background: I'm 13 years old. I ride the bus to school. My brother is older than me. I hate math class. I'm on the soccer team.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Passionate about music, outgoing, and enjoys sharing stories from his experiences.
participant_2.background: My favorite band is Rascal Flatts. We spent summers camping at national parks. I grew up in the industry. I'm a country music singer.
